short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thai text transforming extension for livestream chats

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Lumken extension will transform the text within any text input for more attention, it is optimized to transform most of Thai text, but some modes can work with English, too.

Current Modes : 
เกมเมอร์อมตีน (G4m3r) : Transform some Thai alphabets to English, number.
พรี่คาซึยะ (E x p a n d) : Expand the text with space.
สก๊อย (Skoy) : Transform in to Skoy language (bots cannot read this.)
ควนผำ (Puan) : Change the Thai vowel of the first and last word of the sentence, commonly used within Thai spoken language.
ลู (Lu) : More advanced Puan mode.

With Lumken extension, you will certainly gain more attention within livestream chats, since the transformation of the text is only one click/shortcut away!
